Package com.paiondata.aristotle.service.impl

Class GraphNodeServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.paiondata.aristotle.service.impl.GraphNodeServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphNodeService
@Service public class GraphNodeServiceImpl extends Object implements GraphNodeService
Service implementation for managing graph nodes. This class provides methods for CRUD operations on graph nodes and their relationships.
